{"id":1308290576,"question_id":99,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1720013954,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"22 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1308290576/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Recover Binary Search Tree","memory":"60.2 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for a binary tree node.\n * struct TreeNode {\n *     int val;\n *     TreeNode *left;\n *     TreeNode *right;\n *     TreeNode() : val(0), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x, TreeNode *left, TreeNode *right) : val(x), left(left), right(right) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\nTreeNode* first = NULL;\nTreeNode* prev = NULL;\nTreeNode* middle = NULL;\nTreeNode* last = NULL;\n\npublic:\n    void inorder(TreeNode* root){\n        if(root==NULL){\n            return;\n        }\n        inorder(root->left);\n\n        if(prev!=NULL and prev->val>root->val){\n            if(first==NULL){\n                first=prev;\n                middle=root;\n            }\n            else{\n                last=root;\n            }\n        }\n        prev=root;\n        inorder(root->right);\n    }\n    void recoverTree(TreeNode* root) {\n        first=prev=middle=last=NULL;\n        inorder(root);\n        if(first!=NULL and last!=NULL){\n            swap(first->val,last->val);\n        }\n        else{\n            swap(first->val,middle->val);\n        }\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"recover-binary-search-tree","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
